node.title: Dozens of new charges laid against accused Wisconsin Christmas parade killer
node.alt: a man in handcuff is escorted out the courtroom
node.description: Prosecutors allege Darrell Brooks crashed into people head-on, ran them over as they lay on the ground and continued drivingÂ as they landed on his windshield.
node.content:
["Prosecutors have laid 71 fresh charges against a man\u00a0accused of driving an SUV through a Wisconsin Christmas parade, killing six people and injuring dozens more.", "Darrell Brooks Jr\u00a0steered a Ford Escape for five blocks through the parade route in the Milwaukee suburb of Waukesha on November\u00a021, according to the complaint filed by prosecutors.", "They allege he\u00a0crashed into people head-on, ran them over as they lay on the ground, and at one point leaned out his window to steer because someone had landed on his windshield and was blocking his view.\u00a0", "\"All of the victims who were killed and most of the people that were injured were walking right down the middle of the road in plain view,\" the complaint said.", "", "
Six people were killed in the Wisconsin Christmas parade tragedy.(AP: Jeffrey Phelps)
", "\"[The street]\u00a0was clearly closed to traffic, there were barricades in place and police present to direct motorists for the entire length of the parade route.\"", "Just minutes before driving through the parade, Mr Brooks beat up the mother of his child because she had not bailed him out of jail several days earlier after he was arrested for running her over with the same SUV, the complaint said.", "Prosecutors charged him with six counts of homicide two days after the parade.", "They have now added another 71 charges,\u00a0including multiple counts of reckless endangerment, hit-and-run involving death, battery and bail jumping.", "Mr Brooks is set to appear in court on Friday for a preliminary hearing.", "", "
Driver in custody following Christmas parade tragedy.
", "AP\u00a0"]
